Edema events were reported during treatment and may occur up to several', '181']['abbvie', 'Rovalpituzumab Tesirine', 'M16-298 Protocol Amendment 4', 'EudraCT 2016-003503-64', 'months after last Rova-T dose. As a result subjects should be advised of signs and', 'symptoms of fluid retention as well as monitor their weight and contact treating physician', 'if they arise during this time.', 'Consistent with institutional guidelines or standard practice, the use of diuretics with or', 'without albumin may be considered in subjects with clinically significant edema and', 'hypoalbuminemia.
